title: Research programme to assess risk of sabotage and spying on Irish cables
description: Two-year programme a response to fears that Ireland’s maritime area will be subject to Russian sabotage
content:
A research programme to determine the risk of sabotage, espionage, and disruption to subsea cables infrastructure from hostile states is to be launched by the Government. 
The two-year programme, du… [+3060 chars]
